text.text_translated: One night in 2003, Suzanne Collins was watching television. The news programmes were about the war between the USA and Iraq. Other programmes were competitions where young people tried to win a million dollars. Suzanne said her brain mixed the two programmes together in a worrying way. Her story 'The Hunger Games' came from that.
